choices: She takes him to her room
1.content:
I was laying on the couch watching TV when my sister popped in from the hallway. "I wanna watch Barbie and the Nutcracker." I didn't even bother turning my head as my sister grew impatient. "I wanna watch it now!" She'd finally gotten annoying.

"I am trying to watch cartoons, go back to your room, and be quiet Amanda." Amanda got really mad at me, and screamed!

"My name is not Amanda, It's AJ!" Her name was actually Amanda, but she hated it, and changed her middle name to Jezabelle, so she could have the nickname.

"I'll call you whatever I want, I'm bigger than you." Amanda screamed, and rushed off to her room. I finished watching my show and reached over to grab the remote but it wasn't there. I looked over, and it was ten feet away, across a strange ground. I stood up, and looked around... everything was... giant! I looked over as I heard a door opening, and saw my sisters cat Danny.

I tried to hide, but there was nowhere to do so. Danny ran over, and leaped up onto the couch knocking me down. I started crawling away when I heard a familiar voice. "What do you have there Danny?" I looked up as I felt myself being lifted into the air to my sisters face. A grin broke her curiosity, and I almost turned to tears.
1.title: How it started...

11.content:
Amanda grabbed my hood, and started dangling me over the cat. I couldn't help but cry and flail as this happened. I didn't want to think of what was going to happen to me knowing my sister. The cat's paw landed on my leg, and I let out a loud squeal as it nearly tore my leg off. I tried to close my eyes as this horrid event happened but I couldn't. This game went on forever, and it seemed like Amanda was lowering me closer and closer.

I soon was no longer able to cry as I was reduced to a wimper. My sister didn't seem to be pleased. She lowered me down into the cat's maw. I could only watch as the cat's mouth slowly closed around me. I let out a scream and felt myself being lifted away from the cat. My shoe fell off, and the cat swallowed it. I only knew that was to be my fate.

The cat then jumped into the air after me, and Amanda barely got me out of range. I nearly bawled at this event as she kept lifting and lowering me at the cat. She started dangling from side to side, and the cat jumped again. This event was gretting harder and harder to bear.
11.title: She plays with the cat

111.content:
I couldn't do anything as my life flew past my eyes, but that was cut short as the cat's claw dig into my thigh. A shrillish scream left my throat, and I could barely speak... or scream anymore. My sister laughed as her hand jerked quickly making short bursts up and down causing my sweater to choke me.

I thought this would last forever, when the cat's image grew swiftly. The cat's teeth impaled my side, right around my stomach, and a shock of pain jolted through me as the cat landed. "Danny!" The cat made it's way into my sisters room, and climbed under her bed. It was dark, I couldn't move, but there was a feint meowing noise. Kittens. I felt myself being lowered, and finally dropped, I could feel multiple sharp objects digging into my skin.

.............

The little kittens continued to eat him, and ripped him to pieces. Much of him was found by his sister, who at first disgusted could only smile as she watched the kittens, eat their meal.
111.title: The cat gets him

112.content:
Amanda started dangling me harder, which caused my hood to choke me. This made it hard to scream, which probably helped lead to what came next. She stopped dangling me, and slowly pulled me up to eye level as I caught my breath. I looked directly into her giant, menacing eye, and curled up into a ball. I was terrified, and didn't know what she would do next.

"You're no fun," she cried as she started off. I stayed in the ball as best as I could, so I couldn't see where I was going. Before too long, she stopped, and dropped me. I landed on something hard. Soon I felt a warm sensation across my body that soon went away. Slowly I left my ball, and I looked around trying to find my sister, but she wasn't in the room. I took a moment to try and rationalize what had happened, but It didn't help. How could you rationalize this? It made no sense! It had to be a dream, yes that's it a horrible dream.

looking around I soon noticed that I was walking, my leg had healed. I ran around trying to raise my courage for anything my sister could have planned for me. I took a seat on a giant log sized pencil, and I looked at the large objects around me. One thing that drew my attention was a large pencil holder. I thought maybe I could hide from my sister in there. If I could get her to think I was missing it might give me the chance to run away.
112.title: She gets bored

1121.content:
The pencil holder was smooth so I couldn't just climb it. I looked around looking for anything I could use to climb up it. I finally came to the decision I'd have to use the log sized pencil. I ran over, and tried to pick it up, but It was far too heavy.

I dragged the pencil over to the cup, and tried to figure out how to get it up there. I ran to the sharp, pointed end and started to lift. I could get the pencil a foot or so (actually a couple centimeters) off the ground, but It was a lot of weight. I set it back down to prepare myself for the next lift. I grabbed the pencil, and managed to lift it above my head. I continued to push until I had it set against the cup. I caught my breath, and began climbing.

I got halfway up when I heard my sister talking on the phone outside the door. I started climbing faster, but my body motions started shifting the pencil. I made it to the top as the pencil fell, and I caught the cup with my hand. I threw my leg over, and fell in. I heard the door open, and I tried to quiet my breathing even though she probably couldn't hear it anyway.

I looked up, and saw Amanda's face looking around. My plan worked, she thought I'd escaped. I waited as I could hear her rummaging through her room. I heard the door shut, and I decided to come up for a look. I climbed the pencils, and pens to the top, and she was still in the room. She must have thought if she made it sound like she left, I would come out. She was right...
1121.title: Hides

11211.content:
"You little!" Shouted my sister as she came towards me. I ducked down in the pencil holder, and hoped for the best. I cowered underneath the pencils, when the entire cup began shaking. I soon was falling, and one of the pencils broke my ankle. I grabbed my ankle, and looked up at Amanda, and she was furious.

I tried to apologize, but she just shouted, "Stop it, I don't want to hear an excuse!" She slammed her hands on the desk, and just screamed. The shock sent knocked me on my butt, and the scream deafened me. I didn't know what to do, what was going on this was a nightmare. She raised her hands, and I cuddled in a ball.

*slam* Her hands struck the desk, and the shock wave made me roll. She grabbed my shirt and lifted me into the air, and held me to her face. I uncovered my eyes, and looked at her menacing gaze. She had angry eyes, but her lip was oddly quivering. normally you wouldn't notice it, but being this small it really stuck out.

Suddenly I was falling, and when I struck the table my breath was cut short. Amanda picked me up again while I was at a loss. I was just about to catch my breath, when she dropped me again. I couldn't breath I felt like I was gonna die. I looked up at her, her fist raised in the air, and closed my eyes.

..................

Amanda crushed her big brother underneath her hand, and but a single tear dropped from her eye. She left the room, and got a napkin to clean up the mess. After a while the tear had dried up, and she smiled. Laughing almost she called her friend with an incredible story to tell.
11211.title: Amanda sees him

11212.content:
I ducked back into the cup, and listened for the door once more. She must have looked for another ten minutes before leaving. Once I heard the door slam I climbed up again. No sign of Amanda. I climbed out of the cup, and looked for a way down. I found a spool, but there was no way the spool would stay up here while I climbed down.

I then got an idea, I'd use pencils to hold the spool, and then climb down. I aligned the pencils on the base of the spool, and unwrapped a thread long enough to get to the floor. I hoped three pencils was enough to hold my weight, and I started to climb. To climb down I just slid small amounts at a time, making sure not to fall to fast, or burn my hands.

As I was climbing down, I'd feel small jerks of falling. With one fourth my climb left I looked up. The pencils were giving way! I slid faster now, when suddenly I was free falling. I hit the ground, and looked up. The pencils were coming straight at me! I curled into the fetal position, and hoped for the best. The ground rumbled around me, and finally it calmed down. I got up, and looked around at the mess of string, and pencils.

I started venturing across the room, when I noticed she'd thrown a lot of things on the floor looking for me. She even threw her underwear down. I walked underneath one of her bras when it fell on top of me. At first my heart started racing, but I soon remembered that bra's were made of light weight material. I crawled under one edge, which made me remember something. Amanda was complaining about a mouse hole she found in her room.
11212.title: He ducks in time

112121.content:
I looked around until I found a binder laying against the wall. I ran over to the binder, and began pushing up on it. Clearly at my diminished size I was unable to move the massive binder. I took a quick second to observe my surrounding, then I had an idea. I ran back to the pencil that almost fell on top of me, and started dragging it back to the folder.

I reached the binder, and wedged the pencil under the binder. It wasn't easy, but I got it pretty far under the folder. I ran over to the giant mounds of clothes, and began digging out socks. I grabbed about ten, and dragged them all over to the binder. Lastly I needed to find something hard. After searching through the room all I could find was a Barbie doll, at least twice my height.

I grabbed her arm and dragged her over to the pencil, and wedged her under the pencil. I then began layering the socks onto the end of the pencil. After about eight socks I'd created a big enough hole for me to climb under the binder, and into the mouse hole. Once in the hole I placed my hand on the wall, and began making my way through the narrow corridor. I must walking for ten minutes when...
112121.title: find the mouse hole

1121211.content:
A loud cheap echoed through the small corridor and I froze. A mouse probably looking for it's next meal standing only inches in front of me. The eyes go closer, but I was too afraid to move. I could feel it's warm stinky breath on my body, when I finally broke. I ran, bolted away, but the mouse was way too fast.

The mouse made a roaring screech behind me which deafened me. It knocked me down, and grabbed me with it's teeth. It's two front teeth dug into my stomach and I screamed. The mouse ran off, and with every bobbing movement a shock of pain shot through my body. The mouse finally stopped, when it dropped me onto a large pile of sticks. I began to feel dizzy, and my body turned numb. Just then I felt a pain jolt through my arm.

...............

The mouse devoured him piece by piece, until nothing remained. All that would be left of him was small little mouse turdletts. Amanda continued searching for her little brother for a few days, but all she could find was a little present, left in her room.
1121211.title: Glowing Eyes

1121212.content:
A light shone in from a hole ahead of me. It was the most beautiful thing I'd seen for a while. I continued on my path until I found myself in the living room. I looked around, and found Amanda cleaning up a giant mess. She probably made the mess looking for me. I waited for her to look away, before I darted behind the chair.

I looked at Amanda, and it seems she didn't see me. I turned to continue my path across the room, when I was shocked by the giant Danny laying right next to me. The massive cat was but an inch away causing me to freeze. I was stuck for a moment, when I realized he was sleeping. I took advantage of this, and continued on.

I made a mad dash from the chair to the couch hoping Amanda didn't look... She didn't. I reached the end of the couch, and looked around. Above me on the arm of the couch my mom's purse. I knew if I could reach it mom would find me, and I would be safe. I climbed the furry couch, and took a second to rest on the arm when mom came out with a vacuum.
1121212.title: A Light

11212121.content:
Weighing my options I decided it would probably be safer to avoid being crushed in my mother's purse. But I also know how dangerous to hit the floor, and mom started vacuuming. I tried to get my mom's attention from here but it would be hard as I had to worry about catching Amanda's attention and having to deal with torture yet again.

I kept trying to get mother's attention, but I couldn't she never looked my way. I had to make a choice to attempt something that would almost definitely catch Amanda's attention, or to wait till mom get's closer. looking at my options I decided to wait. I huddled up against her purse, and rested.

As mom came closer, Danny leaped onto the arm of the couch. Looking directly into it's eyes I knew I was in danger. I kept close to the purse, and tried to work my way to the other side. The cat jerked, and I fell back, and off the couch. I couldn't grab the hairs of the couch, but I was unable to reach them. As I landed on the floor, I looked up to see a giant vacuum.

..........................

Carol had vacuumed up her son which ripped his body to shreds. The vacuum had pulled his entire body into it's hole, so no mark was left for Carol to find. She turned off the vacuum, and began taking care of the vacuum while she thought, "I wonder what that strange bump on the floor was?"
11212121.title: Get her attention now

choices: He tries to get Carol's attention now
11212122.content:
As mom plugged in the sweeper I hid against the purse. Amanda kept looking my way. i thought maybe she had seen me so trying to get mom's attention would be hard, and probably wouldn't end well for me. I looked down on the floor to see the cat watching the sweeper, and I had to get away from him

I climbed up the strap of the purse and fell into the purse. I thought maybe Amanda or the cat might have seen me so I needed to hide somewhere. Looking around the purse seeing her lipstick, mascara, wallet... there a pouch in the side of the purse. I worked my way over, and climbed in.

Soon after I climbed into the pouch I tried to sit as still as I could. Shortly after I had hid in the pouch things started shuffling around in the purse. My sister must have seen me climb in. The purse kept pressing up against me, nearly crushing me to death. She finally gave up looking for me, and the sweeper stopped.

I stayed still for risk Amanda was waiting for me to climb out. I must have waited for twenty minutes until everything around me started moving. I could hear the rustle of loose change, and keys in the purse while it swayed from side to side. Finally everything stopped moving and I heard the sound of a car starting.
11212122.title: Into the purse

112121221.content:
I climbed out of the purse after mom had reached a safe driving speed. I climbed out of the pouch and worked my way to the edge. I peered upward to see the giant visage of mother. I slowly made my descent to the bottom of the purse, and worked my way safely over to moms shirt.

Once I got there I began climbing up her wool sweater. Slowly I made my way up, and I even tried calling her, but the car was too loud, and covered my feeble voice. As I got about halfway she stopped abruptly causing me to fall off onto her lap. I ran back over to her shirt and began climbing up her shirt again.

Once I got up halfway again, I realized I would have to climb around her gigantic, (now), breasts. As I made my way around her breasts I tried to get her attention again, but her cellphone went off. Now I would have to wait for her to get off to get her attention. As I reached her shoulder and looked ahead on the road, and saw a drunk driver veer off in front of the vehicle.

.........
As they crashed into each other the drunken teen was saved by his airbag, and Carol didn't receive any severe injuries. Meanwhile her son flew straight into the window of his mothers Van. Carol made her way over to the teen to see how he was. "At least no one was hurt by this accident."
112121221.title: He tries to get Carol's attention now

1122.content:
I sat and continued assessing the situation. It had to be a dream, I couldn't really be this small. But earlier it really felt like I couldn't breath, could it be a dream? I didn't know, but whether or not it's a dream I'll be safer if I just go with what she says. I waited a little longer and Amanda finally came back.

"Good to see you haven't moved, maybe training you won't be so hard after all." she smiled, and I tried to smile, but it was meager. I stood up, and she pulled out a small box. it was a glasses case. She opened it up, and commanded I get in. She layed it on the table, and I got in. As soon as I was flat, she shut the box. The whole container started moving and when it finally stopped It opened.

"It's too late to play with you tonight, but don't worry, tomorrow we'll have a lot of fun." She smiled again, and shut the box. I couldn't help but feel that this was just a front for something horrible to happen, the calm before a storm. I tried to go to sleep, but I too nervous. I had to keep her happy, or I would be in for the worst experience ever. I finally got to sleep, and was in for the strangest awakening.
1122.title: Waits

11221.content:
I woke up slowly, and realized, that the glasses case was open. I decided that I shouldn't run off, otherwise Amanda will punish me, and I want to avoid that as long as possible. I looked around, and saw one of Amanda's Barbie dolls, laying next to me. I picked her up, and I'd say she was probably twice my height. I sat on the glasses case after closing it, and waited for Amanda.

After what seemed a while Amanda came in through her door. "I see your awake, good, now it's time for fun. If you want to eat this morning you'll have to complete your first task of the day." She sat her feet on the table, and placed a vile of nail polish next to me. I only knew this would take forever, but if I didn't complete the task I'd starve. I grabbed the brush, and pulled it out of the vile. "Oh," Amanda added, "If you get any of it on my toes, you don't get to eat, and still have to finish."

Being careful, I started to polish her toes. I made it about two toes in, before I had to re polish the brush. I pulled it out, and it dripped on me. My face covered, I propped up the brush so that I could wipe my face, while Amanda giggled at me. I grabbed the brush and continued this chore. As I neared the end of the first foot, I noticed she had very soft skin. I managed to use her toes as a chair, while I worked on another toe. This helped me avoid leaning over helping my back.

Once I got to the end of her second foot. She wiggled her toes while I took care of the brush which again dripped on me like ten times. She took her feet down, and looked at me laughing. Her echoing voice hurt my ears. I looked at her, and she handed me a cotton ball of nail polish remover. I pulled off a small hand ball, and started cleaning myself off. I couldn't get it all though, so Amanda wiped the rest. The fumes put me into a high, and I fell down several times. Just then Amanda placed food next to me, and left the room.
11221.title: next morning

11222.content:
I woke up to a strange noise. I was a bit groggy, and I couldn't make out my dark surrounding. Suddenly a bright light shined above me, and I was temporarily blinded. I opened my eyes, to see my sister. She picked me up, and I heard the noise again. Her stomach was growling.

She giggled and said, "Sorry, but I'm just too hungry to go to sleep." She held me above her face. I looked down at her gaping mouth, and reminded myself this was just a dream. She lowered my foot into her mouth, and she bit down... hard. I screamed in terror as she slowly chewed my foot.

"Sorry, but I'm used to taking small bites, you know that." She brought me above her again, and blood from my leg was splashing her face, and she just giggled. She lowered my leg back in up to the knee, and she bit it off. Another scream left my throat. I tried to kick free, but this became harder with one leg.

"This has to be a dream, it just has to be." I cried Amanda just giggled, and caught my other foot in her mouth. She tore it off, and I couldn't even make a sound. She giggled, and said, "Don't worry brother, this nightmare'll be over soon." She again lowered my leg in till the knee, and bit. I was crying, but everything began to get hazy. Soon I couldn't feel anything. pressure fell upon my waist, and soon I couldn't see, and everything went black.

..............
Amanda continued to slowly pick at her brothers body until she finally chewed up his head and swallowed. "ahh, that was delicious." She layed back down, and went to sleep.
11222.title: later that night

choices: a phone, talking to a friend...
12.content:
I looked up at Amanda, and could only hope that she hadn't already planned on something horrible for me. Amanda cracked another smile, as her cat poked at me with it's paw. She started giggling as the cat knocked me down. She finally grew bored with the cat's muse, and picked me up.

I could feel myself being raised into the air, as she made me eye level with her. She seemed amazed as she examined me from head to toe. I also took the moment to examine myself. I was still wearing my clothes, thank god, and I could tell my strength was but a fraction of what it used to be as I struggled to get free.

Amanda giggled as I struggled, and not only was it annoying, but quite deafening too. I looked up at my sister, and was amazed at how large she appeared. "Oh my god!" Amanda giggled again as my voice sounded so squeaky. I tried to pull my arms out to cover my ears but I couldn't. I looked back at my sister, and even though I'd been shrunken for a good amount of time now, I couldn't help but now realize just how frightening it really was.

Amanda looked like she was thinking, and if I'd learned anything, that was bad. She lowered me, and slid me into the pocket of her skin tight pocket. I tried to move, but I was at a loss for breath, as I was crushed in her pocket with every move she made. She finally stopped for a moment, and I caught my breath. I looked up, and saw Amanda was talking to mom. I tried to scream, but Amanda leaned, crushing me in her pocket.

Amanda took off again, and I was back to gasping for air. She finally pulled me out of her pocket, and dropped me on a hard surface. I caught my breath, and looked around. I was standing on her desk. I noticed she was gone, so I took the chance to look around. I couldn't believe how big the room was. It looked like a 20 foot drop to the floor. I sat on a pencil which was like a log to me.

Amanda finally came back in, and she was holding...
12.title: She takes him to her room

121.content:
Amanda placed the plate on the desk, and pulled up a seat. I tried to run, but became too afraid when she blocked me with her knife. I slowly backed away until I fell back onto the plate. Amanda laughed, and I nearly wet myself. "Here are the rules, I'm hungry, and too lazy to to get some food, so your my meal. If you can avoid me for 10 minutes, I'll let you go till breakfast, but if I catch you, your my new meal."

Amanda pulled out an egg timer, and placed it on the table next to the plate, and I knew it was already started. Amanda wasn't about to give me a moment to prepare myself. I looked up, and saw the knife coming right for me. I rolled to the side, and caught my footing at the end of the plate. The fork came, and knocked me on my back. I stood up, and the knife was coming for my legs.

I managed to jump it, and looked at the time. 9, and a half minutes remained. Already tired, I ducked as the fork was coming right at me. The deafening sound of my sister's laughter came out, and I fell down. I opened my eyes, and managed to barely avoid the fork as it came stabbing down. After it hit the plate, she brushed me to the side, closer to the center of the plate.

Without even thinking about it, I'd been trying to get off the plate. I ran towards one edge, and the knife came crashing down in front of me, and I fell on my butt. She again brushed me back to the center of the plate, but this time the fork was waiting for me. She picked me up with the utensils, and tossed me into the air. I hit the plate, and felt like I was going to break. She picked me up again, and tossed me into the air.

As I was coming down I saw that I still had 8 minutes remaining I would only gasp as I hit the plate again and started catching my breath as my sister was laughing to hard to continue the game. I thought I might be able to get away, and ran for the edge of the plate, but sure enough the fork intercepted me again. She only laughed as I looked up, wondering if I'd survive...
121.title: plate, knife, fork...

1211.content:
The game seemed as it would never end. She kept pushing me around on the plate, keeping me from getting off, and running away. I kept trying to get off, but she wouldn't allow it. I caught glimpse of the time, one minute left. I looked up, and saw a small grin on my sisters face. The fork came diving at me, and I rolled to the side.

I started standing up, but fell on my back when the knife came crashing down in front of me. She shoved me to the side, and made another swipe with the knife, but missed. I got up, and the knife was coming at my legs. If it weren't for high jump in gym, I would never have made that jump. The alarm went off, and Amanda slammed the silverware on the floor.

She picked me up, and carried me over too her bed. "Well 'little' brother guess we go again tomorrow morning." She dropped me in a drawer, and locked me in. I tried to feel a way out, but to no avail. I decided to lay down, and go to sleep.

I was awoken by a loud buzzing noise. The noise was unbareable. I grabbed my ears, and stood up, but fell as the drawer was opened. I looked up at my sisters, even more giant face. "Good morning little brother time for breakfast." Her giant hand came in and grabbed me encasing me in her hand. unknowing what would come next, I waited to find out what she had planned.
1211.title: He wins

12111.content:
My entire world was moving, but to where I didn't know. I tried to find a way out, but that proved useless. Soon I could hear noises, like a cling noise coming from the outside. Before too long my sister had opened her hand. I looked around, and saw we were in the kitchen.

I turned to my grinning sister, and she said, "Well, it's morning brother, time for the most important meal of the day. Here are the rules, if you can be the last thing in the bowl, I won't eat you." She tilted her hand, and I fell into a cold white ocean. I surfaced and realized the game had begun.

With her spoon she grabbed a large portion of cereal from next to me. Judging by the large round, and brown shapes, she was eating coco puffs. The spoon came down, and I dived hoping to avoid it. Soon I resurfaced, and couldn't see but instead could hear my sister's deafening laughter.

I wiped my eyes, and saw the giant metal spoon coming at me. I was pushed under the wave of milk, and then I was rushed to the surface. She was mixing around the cereal,pushing me up, down and around the cereal. Soon she pulled another spoonful of cereal from next to me, and chewed it slowly.

Just then I heard a familiar voice, mom! I looked around, and found her giant figure. I waved my arms, and tried to get mom's attention when the large spoon came, and pushed me under the milk. I swam back up, and saw the spoon rising above me, and Amanda chewed yet another spoonful of cereal.
12111.title: She's having cereal for breakfast

121111.content:
I continued dodging the spoon left and right, as she scooped up her cereal, playing with me. I had reached an edge but the sides were too slippery to climb. I dived in as she swiped at me with the spoon. As I surfaced I wiped my eyes, and was off again. She playfully stirred me from time to time, and slowly chewed away at her food.

She was running low on cereal and grew more fierce. Soon though it was just me and one puff left. I tried to swim away but she scooped us both up at the same time. I ran to the end of the spoon, and leaped off as she placed the spoon in her mouth, and chewed up the last of the coco puffs.

I'd landed on the table, and took a moment to catch my breath. Amanda must have thought she'd won, so I ran to my mothers plate. She was eating pancakes. I jumped up and down, when mom poured syrup onto the pancakes. A fork came down in front of me, and cut off a small piece of pancake from right in front of me.

I tried to crawl away but the syrup was too thick. the fork came down next too me and tore off another huge chunk of pancake. I surface the syrup, and I heard my sister giggle. I looked over at her, and saw her looking right at me. "What is it honey," mother asked Amanda.

"Oh it's nothing," she replied. I tried to run for it, but the fork was too fast. She cut off another large chunk of pancake.. with me on it. I tried to move, but the syrup was a trap. I watched as I was drawn closer to my mothers lips. I tried to scream, but syrup rolled over my head. Mom placed me in her mouth, and everything went dark.

...........

Carol chewed the small piece of pancake, and crushed her 'little' son in her mouth. "I think there was a bug on that piece." Mother looked at her pancakes for another bug, but found none, and all the while Amanda giggled as she took care of her bowl.
121111.title: He wins?

121112.content:
I was swimming for my life, literally. I couldn't believe the situation. Here I was swimming in a bowl of cereal trying to avoid getting eaten by my sister, who shrunk me down to the size of a coco puff.

My thoughts were cut short as she scooped another spoonful of cereal.. with me in it! I swam to an edge as the spoon came ever closer to her milky lips. I managed to get off the spoon but unfortunately I fell back into the bowl of cereal. She must not have seen me because she started to scoop up the rest of the cereal.

Soon I was the only thing left in the bowl, I was safe, when suddenly the bowl started shaking. The edge of the bowl came to her lips, and she started drinking it. I swam as hard as I could, but she'd drained my strength from pushing me around with the spoon. Her parted lips were a death sentence for all that entered.

I swam and swam with all my might, but at this new size it didn't matter what I did. I slowly moved towards her lips, and all at once the last of the milk pulled me into her mouth. She swished me around for a little, playfully chewing with her massive teeth, then swallowed.

............

Amanda took her bowl over too the sink, and washed it out. She never did care about germs as she placed the bowl in the dish strainer having improperly washed it. Amanda head off to her room down the hall, as she rubbed her tummy and said, "Bye bye 'little' brother."
121112.title: She wins

12112.content:
After a few moments my whole world began to shake. I was turned upside down, and the ground below me opened up. Falling I landed softly, and safely. I sat up, and realized I was sitting on bread. I looked back up to Amanda's face, but instead found a giant Grape Jam container. I tried to run, but the jam fell too fast. She spread the jam which caused a great pressure on my body.

I tried to move, but the jam really limited me. I was stuck looking at my sister, and she began, "All you have to do is make it out of the sandwich, and you won't have to die." Her cheerful attitude almost made it feel like a game. A great shadow loomed over head, and everything went black.

A new and greater pressure crushed my body. I started losing air, and had to get free. I felt the world around me moving, and then with a great jerk, my head reached a pocket of air. Gasping I started pulling myself into the pocket, but it was too hard to move. Suddenly the roof pulled away.

I made a quick survey, at least half the sandwich was gone. Amanda giggled, and place the top slice back on. When she placed it back down I was shoved back into the jelly. The gradual movement of my world, and sudden jerks continued, Until I finally blacked out.

................

Amanda finished her sandwich saving the last bite for her brother. She chewed slowly to make sure she would be able to feel him between her teeth. After she finished she took care of her plate, and go to the bathroom.
12112.title: She's making a sandwich

1212.content:
This game seemed to go on for hours, even though it was only ten minutes long, and there was still 1 and a half minutes left. I Stood there catching my breath, and was happy to see that even after 9 minutes, my impending doom could still entertain her. She swooped at me with the knife, and I fell over exhausted barely avoiding it. The fork was coming down, and I managed enough strength to roll out of the way.

I barely stood up, and my sister wasn't laughing anymore. She must be bored I realized as I checked the time. 10 seconds. She came at me with the knife, and I barreled over it. The fork came at me, and I stepped to the side. She seemed to be angry she couldn't get me now that she was trying. She made a final stab at me, and I managed to fall out of the way. The buzzer went off, and she stopped the deafening noise.

I stood up in triumph, and she knocked me down with a knife. "What are you doing?" She takes the fork, and stabs it into my stomach. I couldn't believe the amount of pain I had felt, but that wasn't the end. She rose her other hand holding the knife, and cut of my leg. I screamed unbearably, and all she did was pick up the leg, and put it in her mouth. I layed there screaming and crying as she slowly chewed my leg.

"Sorry, I'm just too hungry to wait till morning, guess you'll just be a bedtime snack," She giggled, and cut off my other leg. I began to get lightheaded, and started scream less. She seemed less interested in me, and picked up my legless torso. She kicked my body up so I was looking into her eyes. She then bit one of my arms off. Though it wasn't as strong I definetly let off a scream. Finally she bit only my torso, and slid me off the fork.

...........

Amanda holding the bloody torso of her brother in her mouth, rose her head sharply, and threw him into the air. She caught him in her mouth, and slowly chewed away, being sure to crush every bone in his body. She finally swallowed him, bit... by bit.
1212.title: She wins

122.content:
She was talking to her friend Steffiny. She was in middle school with my sister I couldn't make out much of what she was saying. Even though at this size even a pin drop would sound like someone dropping a steel bat on the floor, she talked way to fast for anyone but Steffiny and her to comprehend. It's almost like a loud hum, like a television with nothing on.

After about a half an hour she finally hung up the phone, and turned to me. during that time, I'd tried to get used to my current size, but I would never be used to the giant sized people. She picked me up by the hood, and examined me, almost like she was trying to decide if I was good enough. After a moment she dropped me back onto the desk, and went over to her closet.

She dug through the closet basically trashing the room, and finally pulled out a hamster cage. She came over and set the cage down next to me, checking to see If I would be able to get out. Obviously not, after all I'm the size of a barbie doll. She opened the door, and shoved me in. I looked back and saw she was taping the handle of the door so I wouldn't get out.

She picked up the cage, and slid it under her bed. "Good night 'little' brother." She giggled, and lowered her blanket over the cage. I ran to the edge of the cage, and felt for any opening that would let me out, but no such luck. I looked for a more comfortable spot than the bars on the bottom of the cage. I finally found a small house with a wooden floor. It wasn't the best but it would do till morning,,,
122.title: a phone, talking to a friend...

choices: she pulls him out at lunch
she pulls him out in the hall
1221.content:
I awoke with a shock to a buzzing alarm, and hit my head on the roof of the small wooden house I'd taken refuge. I grabbed my ears, and worked my way around trying to wake up. I looked around and saw the room empty. The alarm was giving me a headache, and I tried to get to the quietest part of the cage I could.

I heard the door shut, and looked up at my sister coming into the room, and she had a towel on. She must have just come out of the shower. She turned off the alarm and crouched down to greet me. She must have seen my hands on my ears cause she said, "morning, sorry about the rude awakening, I woke up early, and I must have forgotten to turn it off." While she was crouched, I could see directly up her towel, at her vagina. She threw the blanket over the cage, and she walked off.

I waited trying to get rid of my headache when the blanket came up. Amanda was fully dressed, and, she had put on some lipstick. "Come on, it's time to go to school." She opened up the cage, and pulled me out. Her grip was strong, and I felt like my bones were gonna crush. I let out a weak cry, and she loosened up. "sorry, I guess I don't know my own strength. She looked at me with that childish smile she always used to get out of trouble. I decided it best in my interest not to complain, but I then thought about what she said.

"You can't take me to school," I cried, but she just giggled.

"Of course I can, you're my doll now, I can do whatever I want to you." As she said those words I couldn't help but feel inadequate.

"But this isn't right, you can't just do with me as you please, I'm a human being... I'm your brother!"

She looked at me, almost like she was thinking, but her innocent smile turned to a frown. "Don't talk to me that way. I'll give you this warning, but next time I'll have to punish you." she said as she stuffed me in her backpack. She zipped it up as I wondered what sh\e could have meant. As she walked, everything around me started jumping around, making it hard for me to look around. This continued for a while until...
1221.title: school day tomorrow

12211.content:
After a while, I'd gotten so bored I had to take a nap. Then I was awaken by a loud zipping noise. "Here he is." Amanda said, as a giant hand came at me. My entire body was being squeezed, and lifted high into the air. I looked around, to see I was outside surrounded by all of Amanda's friends.

"Aww, he so cute," they all chimed. I didn't know if I should be disgusted or complimented... Disgusted of course. Before too long I was being passed between all of the girls. Their giant hands kept cupping and squeezing me as I was being jerked one way to another. Finally a voice came, "Hey, hey, not too much now, we don't want to scare him.Finally I was in one of the girls hands,

"He must be hungry, here you go little fellah," I looked up to see Jen's face, and her other hand feeding me some lettuce. I reluctantly bit from it, and took the small piece of lettuce from her. I felt like a pet hamster as I fed off this leaf.

"He's not a hamster," said one of the girls. That thought made me chuckle inside I couldn't believe she said what I was thinking.

"He's eating it isn't he." said Jen. I finished the leaf, and again I was handed off, but this time to Amanda.

"So who gets him?" I looked at her in shock, how could she just hand me off like that, besides I'm sure Mom will wonder where I've gone after a day or too. I hope. The girls all wanted me of course, for what ever twisted Idea they had going. Finally Amanda put an end to their loud chirping as to who should get me, and pulled some grass leaves to play straws.
12211.title: she pulls him out at lunch

choices: She was at Carly's house, she was in the 7th grade with Amanda
She was at the mall, meeting up with Ashley, who was in the 8th grade
1222.content:
I had the strangest dream I tell you. First my sister wines at me for not letting her watch her stupid barbie movie, then I find out, I'm the size of a barbie doll myself. Then my sisters cat plays with me, until Amanda picks me up, and places me in her pocket. Once were in her room I found even a pencil to be the size of a log, and then my sister made me sleep in a hamster cage!

I tell you it was the strangest dream, and I know it will all be over when I wake... up......
I awoke in a moving environment. I opened my eyes, but everything was dark. I must be in the car cause there was a large bump out of nowhere. As I landed, I realized I was underneath some cloth like material.

I started to climb my way out, but we hit another bump. I was soon buried even deeper in the clothy material. I tried to climb out, but my leg was wrapped with something, so I just waited where I was. As I waited I tried to figure out where I was. I felt around, but all I could feel were different clothy materials.

Suddenly everything came too a halt, and then to a start again. "You have fun sweety," came a voice.

"I will mom," replied my sister. I finally figured it out. I was in my sister's backpack, and I was wrapped somewhere in her clothes. I listened to figure out where she was going, listening for any familiar voice.
1222.title: it's the weekend

12221.content:
From the voice I could tell it was Carly. I don't really like her because she always stares at me. Just last week she was over, and I walked through the room, she was watching me the whole way through. I felt my surroundings again, when I realized I was tangled in with a bra! Worrying what Amanda would think I began untangling the cord from my leg.

As I got half way through the tangle I heard a loud and quick, loud, zipping noise. A giant hand reached in and raised me to my sisters face, the bra dangling from my leg. She gasped, then looked at me with a pout when Carly blurted out, "Wait, can you make him smaller, like half his current size?"

"Sure, but why?" Amanda asked.

"You'll see," Carly jested. Amanda looked at me, and I cried no, but she obviously didn't care. I fell, and Amanda caught me in the bra's left cup. I tried to get up, but Amanda's shaky hands made it hard to stay balanced. I looked over to Carly, and she was taking off her bra. Now I'd realized what was happening, and tried to talk Amanda out of it.

Before I could start, Amanda handed me over to Carly, and she raised me towards her left breast. She had C cup breasts, which were almost disproportionate to her miniscule body. The Bra cup pressed firm against her breast, almost crushing me. It was hard to breath but I managed. After a moment I heard them speaking, "Wanna go jump on the trampoline," I heard Carly say.

Amanda sounded pouty, "I don't know, I thought we could work on our dance routine."
12221.title: She was at Carly's house, she was in the 7t...

122211.content:
The two girls ran off to some other room, meanwhile I was bobbing up and down. I soon grew nauseous, when finally it stopped. I caught my breath, but I knew it wouldn't last long, as music started up. "I'm a barbie girl, in a barbie world," I hate that song.

My neusea came back before she even started bobbing again. As the dance carried on my head was spinning from the low amount of oxygen I was able to recieve, the constant bobbing, and the extremely loud music pounding on my eardrums. It was soon that I finally puked all over. Now I had to deal with the all that, and puke covering most of my body, and rubbing up against this giant mound of flesh.

Before too long I started moving away from the puke. I'd realized that her breast was getting sweaty, and it was lubricating my decent. Now instead of bobbing around, I was bouncing around at the bottom of her bra cup. Bouncing and flopping, I ended up hanging on to her bra for dear life.

She made a few quick movements, and I was falling. I'd caught onto her belt, but hip movements kept me from holding on for long. Still falling, I grabbed her pocket, and was on a quick journey to the floor. Once there I was stunned, but I managed to pick myself up. I looked up at the two giant titans, and found that I was right in the middle of their duet.

Dodging left and right I could barely keep up. A large white clothe landed straight in front of me sending me flying. I landed a few feet away, and realized that the music had stopped. I watched one of the pairs of gigantic feet leave.
122211.title: Dance

1222112.content:
I realized that even though I was tired this would be my only chance to escape. As I ran though my heart sank as I heard a voice in the distance, "Hey that was a workout, maybe we should check on him?" I stopped only momentarily to turn back, and look up at Carly as she pulled her shirt forward.

"Oh, no, I think I smashed him, look." Carly called Amanda over too her, who looked at her bra, and acted disgusted, but smiled when she turned away. I realized that now, they may not even recognize me thinking that I was dead, so I decided it best to run for my life.

"Hey Carly, what song should we practice next?" Amanda had called to Carly, who hm'd before replying.

"I don't care, I'm gonna go clean him up before we dance though, make sure he doesn't stain." Her response turned cold in my heart, but I just kept running. I looked back for but a second as I saw the titaness towering towards me. I kept my pace, but was growing tired.

Keeping away as best I could I was running for cover underneath a potted plant. I could hear the thunderous thumping of her foot as she was walking. The sound became louder and louder. Eventually I began slowing down. A great shadow appeared around me, and I tripped, hitting the ground.

.................

As Carly crushed John, she slowly grinded him into the ground as she turned to enter the next room. Continuing on her way she got to a sink, and wiped the puke off of her bra. Standing there for a moment she turned around, and leaned against the counter saying, "Too bad he got crushed, I wanted to keep him."

THE END
1222112.title: Carly checks her bra

122212.content:
My entire body was lifted from the suspended bra up then down. If it weren't for the fact I was being suffocated, I'd probably have thrown up. Finally I got a moments rest, but it wouldn't last. Soon the bobbing got even worse.

"I'm sure he's getting his fill," Amanda's voice came.

"I know I am," Carly's voice replied.

"Eeww," Amanda Chimed. For some reason despite the fact I was being crushed by an enormous girls left breast I was able to wonder how girls of this age were as perverted as they were. The bouncing would change from better to worse, until eventually they took a moment to rest. Taking the moment to catch my breath I listened to them.

"Still wanna jump?" asked Amanda.

"You know it." Replied Carly. Preparing for the worse I got a good breath in while I could. The bouncing started up again, but I was starting to shift position. Almost falling I tried to secure a position in the bra, but her breast was breaking my grip. Carly giggled, and then I was out of her bra, holding on to the edge. I held on as hard as I could, but at my new size, the amount of force being applied, I was unable to hold. Falling I tried to avoid any limbs striking me. I hit the ground, and bounced up, making me throw up. I hit the ground again, and again, till I lost conciousness.

.........
As the girls bounced around they giggled at the little boy bouncing with them. The boy gave of feint noises but they were laughing too hard to hear. Finally one of the girls tried to land next to him, but her soft foot came down directly on the little boy. They took a moment to get a hose, and clean off the trampoline, then continued to play.
122212.title: Trampoline

12222.content:
"Hey I heard you had a suprise for me," Came Ashley's Voice. She was often at our house hanging out with Amanda. I'm not so sure she likes me after I tripped on her dollhouse. I put it back together but she's always been mad at me since. Remembering that they were having a conversation, I listened in.

"Come on, lets go get some Polly Pocket toys were saying." Amanda said. They were off. Most of what they were talking about was just boring girl talk, but I did take a moment to try and figure out what was wrapped around me. I felt around, and felt the materials, and realized it was her bra. I realized that if she caught me like this I'd be so screwed. I started crawling my way out, but I couldn't get it off of me. Working my way out, I finally managed to get free.

Just as I got free, when everything around me started to fall. With an abrupt halt, I fell into the mess, and was tangled up again. This time I was able to get out faster, and after I got to a spot I thought would be safe, and non perverted I listened to the girls conversations. "So you never told me, what's the suprise," Ashley asked.

"You're never going to believe it, It's really amazing."

"Well, show me." I heard a loud zipping noise, and after being hit by a blinding light, I felt myself rising high into the air. As soon as my vision cleared I could see myself looking into Ashley's gigantic face. A scream left my throaght, and that just made her and Amanda laugh. I took the moment I had to try and catch my breath, and observe my surroundings.
12222.title: She was at the mall, meeting up with Ashley, wh...

122221.content:
im in a shoe store
Ashley picks me
'well if it isn't John"
she turned to Amanda and ask
"so I can do whatever I want to him right?"

Amanda answers her
of cores, it wouldn't be much of a surprise if not!"

Ashley grows a sinister smirk then she puts me in
122221.title: Their in a Shoe Store

info.brief_description: A boy is shrunk by his sister, and must endure a long hardship being her/her friends toy.
info.description:
This is a story about a boy named John who is shrunken by his sister who is a premature witch. Quickly discovered by her, he finds himself being tossed around on an adventure being traded between his sister and her friends.

This story was meant to be used to help satisfy many fetish needs. Not everyone agrees with my style of writing so I say if you don't like it, you don't have to read it, and I don't need to hear about how you hate the story, unless you actually have some constructive critisism for me. For those who are interested in giving me advice, or believe that I can improve a chapter, and how, feel free to contact me at Sashima8@yahoo.com. You can also talk to me personally by the Aim name Sashimo7.

This story contains many fetishes, most revolving around shrunken men. These fetishes include feet, mini-giantess, breast smothering, vore, unbirth, crush, and if you find another one that you know about and wish to tell me I'll be happy to add it.

If you are only interested in one or just a couple of these fetishes, you can visit the story outline, and I'll be identifying the endings by the fetish they represent. I hope that while navigating this story you don't feel uncomfortable.

No I'll be introducing the characters of my story. If you are paying attention though, you may find that I havn't actually included chapters with all of the presented characters yet. I merely put them on here so you have something to look forward too. I apologize if this angers anyone.

John: The main character of the story. One day sitting on the couch watching tv, he is shrunk by his sister. As time goes by he is traded between his sister and her friends, trapped to their wills doing whatever they want him to. His only hope is to return to his original size before it's too late.

Amanda: The main secondary character of the story, her opinion of John is changed by his actions. From murderous to loving, she can face many mood swings. She in turn is the fate decider of our main character no matter how childish she acts, and how little she truly understands about what she does.

Carol: John's Mother, unaware of his current state, she provides many opurtunities for john to be killed, or maimed in ways she'd never imagined. Disappearing from main story line for a while, she makes an eventual return accepting the fact her son no longer lives...

Danny: A minor character in the story, she is always providing a threat to John. There's not much to be said about this cat yet, except that she's always hungry.

Carly: Carly has a huge crush on John, but she is mature for her age. Whenever around her, she tries to turn John on with her underdeveloped attempt at sexual intamacy.

Ashley: Ashley has always hated John. whenever around her it's only one peril after another as he tries to escape her vicious cluches to the safety(?) of Amanda's hands. Ashley comes up with fun and exciting ways for our character to be tested in his survival skills.

Jen: Always insecure, she has been given John to carry for a while, but depending on John's reaction to this event, she can either learn to love, or despise his very existence.

Amy: Always the strange on of the group, Amy has been friends with Amanda for some time. Whenever she gets the chance to hold John, it's just another limit test of his strength, and intellect. Placing John in potentially life threatening situations she makes for an interesting character.

Andrea: Andrea has been on vacation for sometime, but upon her return she is introduced to our one and only main character John. As it turns out, Andrea is an adventurer, and collecter of various animals, and John has just been put on the top of the list. In her quest to tame John, she grows emotions to which may force him into a new life, or even end it.

Sally: Andrea's pet dog, she plays a more dramatic role in our main characters journey. Giving him rides around the house, she allows John to hide from his giant captor. Only one problem occurs... Won't she come if she's called?

Tricia: Amanda's teacher who has always taken a liking to her students, al little too much of a liking. Having discovered John in Amanda's confiscated purse, she takes him home to make him her personal toy. John soon gets trapped in her house on a rampaging path to sexual destruction.

Alice: A true to life scientist, Alice discovers Amanda and her friends playing with John. She immediately begins taking notes on his actions, stalking him wherever he goes. Finally able to capture him, she puts him in a controlled environment where she will finish studying his behavior before she is finally done with him.

Cathy: A shoe store clerk, she finds John trapped in a shoebox that was left out. Keeping him inside she takes him to the back room where she decides to keep him for her own pleasures. Once she gets home, she keeps the shoebox as an easy way to transport, and keep him sealed. Her common way of interacting with him is not always with her face or hands...

Sam: Her true purpose in the story is to satisfy those who have a desire to see some giantess, and sm action. She enjoys using him to probe, and explore everypart of her body, inside and out. While John only has one goal... Survive!

Alex: During John's great escape he is captured by this busty bug collector. She takes him back and places him in a terrarrium where she can document his various activities, and actions as he tries to stay alive. However, John has other plans than to end up pinned to a board in her basement.



I hope you enjoy my story, I have spent much time writing it, and plan to eventually reach the ending of this hopefully gigantic story.
